review: The stick is alright; the Amazon Prime content is awful. I hadn't done my homework so I was disappointed to find that most of the good old t.v. shows are on Hulu, which isn't free; also expecting TCM-like films, not much there either. Instead we get HBO profanity-laden content.At least I can watch Cheers  and Frazier reruns,at least
author: M. A. Rehak

review: Works great. was easy to install.
author: Gayle Goble

review: Love it! I use this for the Beachbody on demand app and Netflix. It does just what I need it too! Perfect!
